name: Cool Jewels Connect
description:
Cool Jewels is an addictive and exciting adventure match 3 game filled with colorful jewels crunching effects! This jewel game has well designed puzzles for you to play in anytime and anywhere!

FEATURES
- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
- More than 100 challenging castle levels.
- 5 completely different best match 3 games types.
- Helpful magical boosters to win jewel stars.
- Auto hint when you jewel quest but could not find one match.
